verses.verse: For the YY <WH3068> will have mercy <WH7355> <WH8762> on Ya`akov <WH3290>, and will yet choose <WH977> <WH8804> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and set <WH3240> <WH8689> them in their own land <WH127>: and the strangers <WH1616> shall be joined <WH3867> <WH8738> with them, and they shall cleave <WH5596> <WH8738> to the house <WH1004> of Ya`akov <WH3290>.

And the people <WH5971> shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> them, and bring <WH935> <WH8689> them to their place <WH4725>: and the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall possess <WH5157> <WH8694> them in the land <WH127> of the YY <WH3068> for servants <WH5650> and handmaids <WH8198>: and they shall take them captives <WH7617> <WH8802>, whose captives <WH7617> <WH8802> they were; and they shall rule <WH7287> <WH8804> over their oppressors <WH5065> <WH8802>.

And it shall come to pass in the day <WH3117> that the YY <WH3068> shall give thee rest <WH5117> <WH8687> from thy sorrow <WH6090>, and from thy fear <WH7267>, and from the hard <WH7186> bondage <WH5656> wherein thou wast made to serve <WH5647> <WH8795>,

That thou shalt take up <WH5375> <WH8804> this proverb <WH4912> against the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and say <WH559> <WH8804>, How hath the oppressor <WH5065> <WH8802> ceased <WH7673> <WH8804> ! the golden city <WH4062> ceased <WH7673> <WH8804> !
The YY <WH3068> hath broken <WH7665> <WH8804> the staff <WH4294> of the wicked <WH7563>, and the sceptre <WH7626> of the rulers <WH4910> <WH8802>.

He who smote <WH5221> <WH8688> the people <WH5971> in wrath <WH5678> with a continual <WH1115> <WH5627> stroke <WH4347>, he that ruled <WH7287> <WH8802> the nations <WH1471> in anger <WH639>, is persecuted <WH4783>, and none <WH1097> hindereth <WH2820> <WH8804>.
The whole earth <WH776> is at rest <WH5117> <WH8804>, and is quiet <WH8252> <WH8804>: they break forth <WH6476> <WH8804> into singing <WH7440>.

Yea, the fir trees <WH1265> rejoice <WH8055> <WH8804> at thee, and the cedars <WH730> of Lebanon <WH3844>, saying, Since thou art laid down <WH7901> <WH8804>, no feller <WH3772> <WH8802> is come up <WH5927> <WH8799> against us.

SH'ol <WH7585> from beneath is moved <WH7264> <WH8804> for thee to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> thee at thy coming <WH935> <WH8800>: it stirreth up <WH5782> <WH8790> the dead <WH7496> for thee, even all the chief ones <WH6260> of the earth <WH776>; it hath raised up <WH6965> <WH8689> from their thrones <WH3678> all the kings <WH4428> of the nations <WH1471>.
All they shall speak <WH6030> <WH8799> and say <WH559> <WH8799> unto thee, Art thou also become weak <WH2470> <WH8795> as we? art thou become like <WH4911> <WH8738> unto us?

Thy pomp <WH1347> is brought down <WH3381> <WH8717> to the grave <WH7585>, and the noise <WH1998> of thy viols <WH5035>: the worm <WH7415> is spread <WH3331> <WH8714> under thee, and the worms <WH8438> cover <WH4374> thee.

How art thou fallen <WH5307> <WH8804> from heaven <WH8064>, O Lucifer <WH1966>, son <WH1121> of the morning <WH7837> <WH8676> <WH3213> <WH8685> ! how art thou cut down <WH1438> <WH8738> to the ground <WH776>, which didst weaken <WH2522> <WH8802> the nations <WH1471> !

For thou hast said <WH559> <WH8804> in thine heart <WH3824>, I will ascend <WH5927> <WH8799> into heaven <WH8064>, I will exalt <WH7311> <WH8686> my throne <WH3678> above <WH4605> the stars <WH3556> of 'Elohim <WH410>: I will sit <WH3427> <WH8799> also upon the mount <WH2022> of the congregation <WH4150>, in the sides <WH3411> of the north <WH6828>:
I will ascend <WH5927> <WH8799> above the heights <WH1116> of the clouds <WH5645>; I will be like <WH1819> <WH8691> Ha `Elyon <WH5945>.
Yet thou shalt be brought down <WH3381> <WH8714> to SH'ol <WH7585>, to the sides <WH3411> of the pit <WH953>.

They that see <WH7200> <WH8802> thee shall narrowly look <WH7688> <WH8686> upon thee, and consider <WH995> <WH8709> thee, saying, Is this the man <WH376> that made the earth <WH776> to tremble <WH7264> <WH8688>, that did shake <WH7493> <WH8688> kingdoms <WH4467>;

That made <WH7760> <WH8804> the world <WH8398> as a wilderness <WH4057>, and destroyed <WH2040> <WH8804> the cities <WH5892> thereof; that opened <WH6605> <WH8804> not the house <WH1004> of his prisoners <WH615> ?
All the kings <WH4428> of the nations <WH1471>, even all of them, lie <WH7901> <WH8804> in glory <WH3519>, every one <WH376> in his own house <WH1004>.

But thou art cast out <WH7993> <WH8717> of thy grave <WH6913> like an abominable <WH8581> <WH8737> branch <WH5342>, and as the raiment <WH3830> of those that are slain <WH2026> <WH8803>, thrust through <WH2944> <WH8794> with a sword <WH2719>, that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the stones <WH68> of the pit <WH953>; as a carcase <WH6297> trodden under feet <WH947> <WH8716>.

Thou shalt not be joined <WH3161> <WH8799> with them in burial <WH6900>, because thou hast destroyed <WH7843> <WH8765> thy land <WH776>, and slain <WH2026> <WH8804> thy people <WH5971>: the seed <WH2233> of evildoers <WH7489> <WH8688> shall never <WH5769> be renowned <WH7121> <WH8735>.

Prepare <WH3559> <WH8685> slaughter <WH4293> for his children <WH1121> for the iniquity <WH5771> of their fathers <WH1>; that they do not <WH1077> rise <WH6965> <WH8799>, nor possess <WH3423> <WH8804> the land <WH776>, nor fill <WH4390> <WH8804> the face <WH6440> of the world <WH8398> with cities <WH6145> <WH8676> <WH5892>.

For I will rise up <WH6965> <WH8804> against them, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, and cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> from Babylon <WH894> the name <WH8034>, and remnant <WH7605>, and son <WH5209>, and nephew <WH5220>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

I will also make <WH7760> <WH8804> it a possession <WH4180> for the bittern <WH7090>, and pools <WH98> of water <WH4325>: and I will sweep <WH2894> <WH8773> it with the besom <WH4292> of destruction <WH8045> <WH8687>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.

The YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath sworn <WH7650> <WH8738>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Surely as I have thought <WH1819> <WH8765>, so shall it come to pass; and as I have purposed <WH3289> <WH8804>, so shall it stand <WH6965> <WH8799>:

That I will break <WH7665> <WH8800> the Ashurn <WH804> in my land <WH776>, and upon my mountains <WH2022> tread him under foot <WH947> <WH8799>: then shall his yoke <WH5923> depart <WH5493> <WH8804> from off them, and his burden <WH5448> depart <WH5493> <WH8799> from off their shoulders <WH7926>.
This is the purpose <WH6098> that is purposed <WH3289> <WH8803> upon the whole earth <WH776>: and this is the hand <WH3027> that is stretched out <WH5186> <WH8803> upon all the nations <WH1471>.

For the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath purposed <WH3289> <WH8804>, and who shall disannul <WH6565> <WH8686> it? and his hand <WH3027> is stretched out <WH5186> <WH8803>, and who shall turn it back <WH7725> <WH8686> ?
In the year <WH8141> that king <WH4428> Ahaz <WH271> died <WH4194> was this burden <WH4853>.

Rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> not thou, whole Palestina <WH6429>, because the rod <WH7626> of him that smote <WH5221> <WH8688> thee is broken <WH7665> <WH8738>: for out of the serpent's <WH5175> root <WH8328> shall come forth <WH3318> <WH8799> a cockatrice <WH6848>, and his fruit <WH6529> shall be a fiery <WH8314> flying <WH5774> <WH8789> serpent <WH8314>.

And the firstborn <WH1060> of the poor <WH1800> shall feed <WH7462> <WH8804>, and the needy <WH34> shall lie down <WH7257> <WH8799> in safety <WH983>: and I will kill <WH4191> <WH8689> thy root <WH8328> with famine <WH7458>, and he shall slay <WH2026> <WH8799> thy remnant <WH7611>.

Howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, O gate <WH8179>; cry <WH2199> <WH8798>, O city <WH5892>; thou, whole Palestina <WH6429>, art dissolved <WH4127> <WH8738>: for there shall come <WH935> <WH8804> from the north <WH6828> a smoke <WH6227>, and none shall be alone <WH909> <WH8802> in his appointed times <WH4151>.

What shall one then answer <WH6030> <WH8799> the messengers <WH4397> of the nation <WH1471>? That the YY <WH3068> hath founded <WH3245> <WH8765> TZiyon <WH6726>, and the poor <WH6041> of his people <WH5971> shall trust <WH2620> <WH8799> in it.
